column5: Apply nowNowadays, business studies form the basis for many occupational groups. However, many graduates of Bachelor's degree courses still need a special business knowledge for their dream job.Anon-specialized Master's degreeis the solution for Bachelor graduates who want to acquire specific business expertise with a Master's degree. With ourMaster of International Business, you can obtain a master's degree in business administrationwith any first degreein order to broaden your professional perspectives.Prior knowledge of business administration subjects is NOT necessary.View the contents of the International Business Master
column7: As a state-recognized, non-profit university and private business school the ISM is solely financed by tuition fees.- Per semester (EU/Non-EU): 5,700 Euro- Monthly payments are also possible
column9: 3 semesters plus 1 semester thesis full time
